pages.text: $(li)The rumours were true! The $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larva$(/l) become into that... thing!$(br)$(li)Maybe you should throw it into the abyssal void of the End.$(br)$(li)Be careful, we are not sure what consequences such an act like that could have...
